## Writing on networks

Peter Bearman, James Moody, and Robert Faris, "Networks and History" *Complexity* 8 (2012): 61â€“71.

Shawn Graham, Ian Milligan, and Scott Weingart, *The Historian's Macroscope: Big Digital History* (Imperial College Press, 2016). See especially [Network Analysis](http://www.themacroscope.org/?page_id=889) and [Network Analysis Fundamentals](http://www.themacroscope.org/?page_id=892).

Scott Weingart's series on "[Networks Demystified](http://scottbot.net/tag/networks-demystified/)".
